_header: My love is fall upon a may
_description: Christ the Champion for Love — four couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Mi loue is falle vpon a mayffor loue of hire i defende þis
                    day…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Loue antere with wo is bouthþer loue is trewe it
                    flittetȝ nouth
NLS18721.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1924. 2nd ed., rev.: G. V. Smithers, Oxford,
            1952: 90.
Luria,  Maxwell Sidney,  and  Richard L. Hoffman, eds.  
             Middle English Lyrics.
         New York: Norton, 1974: 17.
